name: Sundered Peaks Pass
prompt: Top-down tactical map: Sundered Peaks Pass, 30x40 at 140 px per square, clearly marked cover: crates, pillars, rocks, coral, dynamic hazards like collapsing floors, rips, currents, clean export with 10px grid lines and labeled layers, Use aspect and resolution as specified, maintain consistent styling tags, include negative prompts to avoid artifacts.
alt_text: Top-down tactical map of Sundered Peaks Pass with grid and hazards.
